Desc.entry: A registered charity that delivers relational and community youth work for children and young people aged 8-18 years in the Carwood/Ellesmere area of Pitsmoor. Provides personal development activities and can offer individual support work for young people. Encourages young people to play a positive role in the community. Runs various detached sessions and activity-based work throughout the year. Please contact for further details.

ContactName.entry: Jenny Tibbles, Project Co-ordinator/Danielle Sharp, Youth Development Worker

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9.30am-5.30pm (office times), sessions are at various times and different locations

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
